title: Develop unified approach to toolsets in CoreCLR
body:
Full-framework MSBuild has a fair amount of code that identifies what toolset to use for a given project, and then uses that toolset to identify various behavior knobs.  In our CoreCLR version, we're currently thinking that we won't have the concept of a toolset--if you want a different "toolset", invoke a different msbuild.exe.

Right now this behavior is feature-flagged behind a few different flags, but we should have a nice, easy-to-understand story about what is impacted with a single flag.
